sourcesContent:
export const dataJS = [
  {
    name: "JavaScript.info",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/49552305?s=280&v=4",
    description:
      "From the basics to advanced topics with simple, but detailed explanations",
    link: "https://javascript.info/",
  },
  {
    name: "Free Code Camp",
    subtitle: "Website",
    logo: "https://cdn.rawgit.com/Deftwun/e3756a8b518cbb354425/raw/6584db8babd6cbc4ecb35ed36f0d184a506b979e/free-code-camp-logo.svg",
    description: "FCC JavaScript curriculum",
    link: "https://www.freecodecamp.org/",
  },
  {
    name: "JS Design Patterns",
    subtitle: "Book",
    logo: "https://addyosmani.com/resources/essentialjsdesignpatterns/cover/cover.jpg",
    description: "Improve your knowledge of design patterns",
    link: "https://exploringjs.com/impatient-js/",
  },
  {
    name: "MDN JavaScript",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://cdn.svgporn.com/logos/mdn.svg",
    description: "Best web documentation for javascript",
    link: "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript",
  },
  {
    name: "JavaScript Garden",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://iconape.com/wp-content/png_logo_vector/edinburgh-js-logo.png",
    description: "Documentation about the most quirky parts of JavaScript",
    link: "https://bonsaiden.github.io/JavaScript-Garden/",
  },
  {
    name: "Eloquent JavaScript",
    subtitle: "Book",
    logo: "https://eloquentjavascript.net/img/cover.jpg",
    description: "JavaScript, programming, and the wonders of the digital",
    link: "https://eloquentjavascript.net/",
  },
  {
    name: "You Dont Know JS",
    subtitle: "Book",
    logo: "https://github.com/getify/You-Dont-Know-JS/raw/2nd-ed/get-started/images/cover.png",
    description: "Series of books diving deep into the core mechanisms of JS",
    link: "https://github.com/getify/You-Dont-Know-JS",
  },
  {
    name: "JS for impatient",
    subtitle: "Book",
    logo: "https://exploringjs.com/impatient-js/img-homepage/cover-homepage.jpg",
    description: "An in-depth guide for JavaScript",
    link: "https://exploringjs.com/impatient-js",
  },
  {
    name: "JavaScript 30",
    subtitle: "Course",
    logo: "https://cdn.svgporn.com/logos/javascript.svg",
    description: "Build 30 projects with Js",
    link: "https://javascript30.com/",
  },
  {
    name: "Scrimba",
    subtitle: "Course",
    logo: "https://spectrum.imgix.net/communities/7b672d5f-3eb0-458b-9510-b9b1d3a0f3d6/56048041-72e1-4ced-aeb5-4e8597e5860b-g1122.png?w=256&h=256&dpr=2&auto=compress&expires=1615507200000&ixlib=js-1.3.0&s=3b3163e7924e40865a70c7343a61b695",
    description: "JavaScript curriculum with free courses",
    link: "https://scrimba.com/topic/javascript",
  },
  {
    name: "Learn JS Online",
    subtitle: "Course",
    logo: "https://ih1.redbubble.net/image.815350023.4911/pp,504x498-pad,600x600,f8f8f8.u7.jpg",
    description: "Interactive online course for JavaScript",
    link: "https://learnjavascript.online/",
  },
];

export const dataCSS = [
  {
    name: "MDN CSS/CSS3",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://cdn.svgporn.com/logos/mdn.svg",
    description:
      "As with HTML5, you don't need to know every CSS3 property. Use this reference instead.",
    link: "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/Reference",
  },
  {
    name: "Codrops CSS/CSS3",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "http://codingheroes.io/resources/img/logos/codrops.png",
    description:
      "Another excellent CSS3 reference, this time from Codrops. Make sure to check this one out, too.",
    link: "http://tympanus.net/codrops/css_reference/",
  },
  {
    name: "30 CSS Selectors",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "http://codingheroes.io/resources/img/logos/tutplus.png",
    description:
      "I find myself using this handy list of the 30 most important CSS selectors from Tutplus all the time.",
    link: "https://code.tutsplus.com/tutorials/the-30-css-selectors-you-must-memorize--net-16048",
  },
  {
    name: "CSS haters",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "http://codingheroes.io/resources/img/logos/css-guide.png",
    description:
      "Excellent guide on how to write better, cleaner and more reusable CSS code.",
    link: "https://paulcpederson.com/articles/css-for-people-who-hate-css/",
  },
  {
    name: "Clippy",
    subtitle: "Tool",
    logo: "http://codingheroes.io/resources/img/logos/clippy.png",
    description:
      "A small tool to help you using the new and powerful clip-path property.",
    link: "https://bennettfeely.com/clippy/",
  },
  {
    name: "Cubic-bezier",
    subtitle: "Tool",
    logo: "http://codingheroes.io/resources/img/logos/cubic.png",
    description:
      "A tool for visually generating timing animation functions to use in CSS transitions and animations.",
    link: "https://cubic-bezier.com/",
  },
  {
    name: "Scrimba",
    subtitle: "Course",
    logo: "https://spectrum.imgix.net/communities/7b672d5f-3eb0-458b-9510-b9b1d3a0f3d6/56048041-72e1-4ced-aeb5-4e8597e5860b-g1122.png?w=256&h=256&dpr=2&auto=compress&expires=1615507200000&ixlib=js-1.3.0&s=3b3163e7924e40865a70c7343a61b695",
    description: "CSS/CSS3 curriculum with free courses",
    link: "https://scrimba.com/allcourses?topic=css&price=free",
  },
  {
    name: "Vogella CSS/CSS3",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://www.vogella.com/img/logo/wizard_logo.png",
    description:
      "Learn the usage of CSS, defining font size, margins and padding.",
    link: "https://www.vogella.com/tutorials/CSS/article.html",
  },
];

export const dataHTML = [
  {
    name: "MDN HTML/HTML5",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://cdn.svgporn.com/logos/mdn.svg",
    description: "Best web documentation for html/html5",
    link: "https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML",
  },
  {
    name: "w3schools",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a0/W3Schools_logo.svg/2175px-W3Schools_logo.svg.png",
    description:
      "w3schools is the resource for web developers that covers almost any HTML concept or element.",
    link: "https://www.w3schools.com/html/default.asp",
  },
  {
    name: "HTML in 20 Minutes",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://cdn.svgporn.com/logos/html-5.svg",
    description: "This is not fraud, you really can learn it in 20 minutes.",
    link: "https://www.mtholyoke.edu/acad/germ/neh/HTML.html",
  },
  {
    name: "HTML5 Guide",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://yt3.ggpht.com/ytc/AKedOLSJZqBU6Bf3YvKMIhW_HnnkNG-j3Ba2ndW0N6wjww=s900-c-k-c0x00ffffff-no-rj",
    description:
      "Since you know bit of HTML and usage, check out this Beginner’s Guide.",
    link: "https://websitesetup.org/html-tutorial-beginners/",
  },
  {
    name: "HTML Elements",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://image.flaticon.com/icons/png/512/23/23310.png",
    description:
      "Every HTML document is a hierarchical structure made up of elements and their content.",
    link: "https://www.sitepoint.com/elements/",
  },
];

export const dataWeb = [
  {
    name: "HappyHues",
    subtitle: "Tool",
    logo: "https://ph-files.imgix.net/f7e1dd94-a807-44ba-adb0-8482164a0a0b?auto=format",
    description:
      "Not sure what colors to use in your designs or where to use them? ",
    link: "https://www.happyhues.co/",
  },
  {
    name: "OverAPI.com",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://overapi.com/static/images/overapi-logo.png",
    description: "Collecting All Cheat Sheets",
    link: "https://overapi.com/",
  },
  {
    name: "StackExchange",
    subtitle: "Website",
    logo: "https://cdn.worldvectorlogo.com/logos/stack-exchange.svg",
    description:
      "Show off your skills by linking to your StackExchange account in your resume or website.",
    link: "https://stackexchange.com/",
  },
  {
    name: "GitHub",
    subtitle: "Website",
    logo: "https://cdn.svgporn.com/logos/github-icon.svg",
    description:
      "It’s the place on the Internet where open source projects are built.",
    link: "https://github.com/",
  },
  {
    name: "DevDocs.IO",
    subtitle: "Doc",
    logo: "https://devdocs.io/images/icon-320.png",
    description:
      "DevDocs.IO is the platform that contains documentation for all popular programming languages and frameworks.",
    link: "https://devdocs.io/",
  },
  {
    name: "Resumake.IO",
    subtitle: "To0l",
    logo: "https://i.ytimg.com/vi/W3XTY-Ua0PI/maxresdefault.jpg",
    description:
      "Resumake.IO is an open-source website that helps you make a resume for applying to Software Engineering jobs.",
    link: "https://resumake.io/",
  },
  {
    name: "ProductHunt",
    subtitle: "Website",
    logo: "https://cdn.worldvectorlogo.com/logos/product-hunt.svg",
    description:
      "ProductHunt is a website where developers and companies launch websites, apps, etc that have recently built.",
    link: "https://producthunt.com/",
  },
];

export const dataEx = [
  {
    name: "Gitlens",

      "Generate fake data for name, address, lorem ipsum, commerce and much more.",
